author: Nintendo of America
description:
Overcooked 2! – Nintendo Switch 2 edition is out now! Bon appétit: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/overcooked-2-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

After saving the Onion Kingdom in the original Overcooked!, you and your team of up to four chefs are needed once more to silence the hunger of The Unbread. Tear up the kitchen with 4K, 60 FPS gameplay, enjoy Nintendo Switch 2 features like CameraPlay and GameShare, plus meet an exclusive Chef: The Platinum Platypus.  

Hold onto your aprons and try not to set the kitchen (and your friendships) on fire. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #Overcooked2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.t
title: Overcooked 2! Nintendo Switch 2 Edition – Launch Trailer

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode eight of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action and check out some fun segments like Whose Splat is That? and Outfit Review!

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #8 livestream on Saturday, Nov 8th at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/live/M4zbjmwuZzA

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: The Splatoon 3 North American League Show – Episode 8
